biography: Lynn is a master of the digital marketplace, always on the pulse of the latest trends. As an E-commerce & Digital Marketing Specialist, she understands how to capture attention and drive conversions in the crowded online world. She is socially savvy, data-driven, and relentlessly focused on growth. From viral social media campaigns to optimizing sales funnels, her work ensures that Katje's innovations find their audience and succeed in the market.
